data.title: Did the U.S. Steal $13 Billion in Bitcoin? China Says the Biggest Crypto Heist Ever Was a Black Ops Job
data.description: In October, China accused the US of orchestrating $13 billion crypto hack from China-based LuBian, one of the largest hacks in history, on one of the A Chinese cybersecurity agency claims the U.S. orchestrated the $13 billion hack of LuBian, a major Bitcoin mining pool—an incident only revealed after Arkham Intelligence exposed it in 2025.With the DOJ later indicting Chen Zhi and seizing the bitcoin, both countries are now clashing over one of crypto’s most extraordinary and contested seizures.
data.author: Tim Tolka
